name: LAVABALL
description:
stolesomelemons - Ludum Dare 49 Entry - "LAVABALL" - Theme of "Unstable"

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

What happens when you piss off a Fire God? Well, you are trapped in a small arena with a demon and forced to play a game where an unstable out of control fireball is the ball and you have to score with it! Basically, it's like pong but with a fireball.
